system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.vUk6pSDZo10UZL2w]{Far Shot}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.AG67G8wHzwgao2wI]{Dead Aim}

Benefits

he circumstance bonus from Dead Aim may be stacked each round the character spends aiming, up to a maximum of five rounds. Each round spent aiming beyond the first round also grants a +3 attack bonus instead of a +2.
system.summary: Stack Dead Aim bonus, increase to +3
